attributes.action: create a National Youth Employment Program for young people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The number of long-term jobless youth is at a 15-year high.  

Nearly 400,000 people between 16 and 24 have been looking for a job for at least 6 months.  The number is higher if ages up to 30 years are included.

Young people, if unable to find work, are more likely to drift into disappointment, idleness, and crime.

This petition is for the creation of a national Yough Employment Program.  This program will offer employment to every young person, at a decent wage.

The program can put young people to work on a number of programs to improve our environment, parks, communities, security, and so on.

This program would be really useful for the country at this stage.
